page.title: 13Life Styles.Kennels.
page.content: Major Perkins, retired Headmaster of Shaftesbury Modern School, now runs a boarding kennel.He employs 3 kennel-maids and when full can take 60 dogs. He charges Â£1.85 a day for a small dog rising to Â£2.50 for a great dane. Each dog has 2 walks a day and is groomed. Horses,parrots,donkeys,goats and many other animals are also boarded. Eggs and honey are sold at the door. The working day is 0700-2200hrs.Tents and caravans are welcome. Mrs Perkins taught at Stower Provost School. Major Perkins prefers dogs and children to adults.He certainly enjoys his guests!
